Name: Break Everything - Park
About the game: You need to use the toy rifle to shoot the balls to destroy objects. In the game, you control the player on the WASD keys. and aim with the mouse, when you aim at the object, shoot, if you hit the right point, the object will be destroyed, you need to destroy objects as quickly as possible. Objects have displaced centers of impact, so you need to understand exactly which point of the object to shoot at. Break objects the fastest! Be the first on the Steam leaderboard! The game has achievements.
